title: Provenance Event
description: Schema for provenance events in the llm_echo pipeline.

timestampiso.description: The ISO 8601 timestamp of the event.

module.description: The module that emitted the event.

commitsha.description: The git commit SHA of the code that generated the event.

inputhash.description: The SHA256 hash of the input data.

outputhash.description: The SHA256 hash of the output data.

provenancetoken.description: A unique token for the provenance event.
